title: [match] fails with `readonly: true` for type, that doesn't exist in Git repo
body:
```
sync_code_signing(
      git_url: "...",
      type: "appstore",
      app_identifier: "...",
      readonly: true
)
```

This results in an exception when type `appstore` is not present as a folder in the git repo:

```
Î» bundle exec fastlane certificates
```
